channel.title: [OSRS] BattleScape - PK Server - Wildy Bosses
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/1zdugsn.jpg[/img]
[URL=http://"http://www.battle-scape.com/"]Website[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://www.battle-scape.com/forums"]Forums[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://www.battle-scape.com/register.php"]Register[/URL][/CENTER]
We have a very long history, dating back 7 years before the wilderness was first removed. We've been around since private server's main focus point was simply to get you PKing quickly, instead of having to train an account over a long period of time.
Whether you're looking to login and get straight to PKing and PvP, fight against bosses to obtain rare items, or compete for the number 1 rank on the hiscores, we offer it all.
We have many features that will keep you entertained and playing, including:
[ul][*]Instant PKing with basic gear [*]Many bosses and slayer monsters for earning rare items [*]Skilling and hiscores [*]The combat system is one of the best in all of RSPS [*]Very popular dueling and staking [*]No downtime and no lag [*]An expensive and powerful dedicated server [*]One of the most active forums [*]PK Point Shop to encourage wilderness activity [*]Achievements [*]Multiple minigames [*]A main server over the years for clanning [*]Fully customizable client [*]Active and friendly staff[/ul]
[CENTER] [img]http://i.imgur.com/K0KjeI9.png[/img]

item.title: [OSRS] BattleScape - PK Server - Wildy Bosses
item.dc:creator: @PalidinoDH PalidinoDH
item.description:
@PalidinoDH wrote:

Update

[QUOTE=Palidino;100058]
Corporeal Beast has been added.
Fight Cave has been added. F2P start on wave 33, and P2P on wave 48.
Added a safe smoke devil area.
Moved dragon boots to the luxury shop for 150k.
God staves have been added to the luxury shop.
Removed occult necklace and dagannoth rings from the PKP shop.
[/QUOTE]

Read full topic

item.title: [OSRS] BattleScape - PK Server - Wildy Bosses

item.description:
@Project_Runescape wrote:

I guess you succeed again
gl.

item.title: [OSRS] BattleScape - PK Server - Wildy Bosses
item.dc:creator: @PalidinoDH PalidinoDH
item.description:
@PalidinoDH wrote:

[QUOTE=Palidino;99783]

[ul][]Every 30 minutes, Party Pete will give you a random lucky item which lasts 15 minutes.
[]Added a Barrows teleport to PvM.
[]Added purple sweets to the general store.
[]Added more items to the luxury shop.
[]Lowered the rate of EP gain.
[]Fixed more player design bugs.[/ul]

[/QUOTE]

newest update

Read full topic

item.description:
@PalidinoDH wrote:

[CENTER]

Website | Forums | Register[/CENTER]

We have a very long history, dating back 7 years before the wilderness was first removed. We’ve been around since private server’s main focus point was simply to get you PKing quickly, instead of having to train an account over a long period of time.

Whether you’re looking to login and get straight to PKing and PvP, fight against bosses to obtain rare items, or compete for the number 1 rank on the hiscores, we offer it all.

We have many features that will keep you entertained and playing, including:

[ul][]Instant PKing with basic gear
[]Many bosses and slayer monsters for earning rare items
[]Skilling and hiscores
[]The combat system is one of the best in all of RSPS
[]Very popular dueling and staking
[]No downtime and no lag
[]An expensive and powerful dedicated server
[]One of the most active forums
[]PK Point Shop to encourage wilderness activity
[]Achievements
[]Multiple minigames
[]A main server over the years for clanning
[]Fully customizable client
[]Active and friendly staff[/ul]
